title: Logistics Partner Registration Form - Shypr
html: Logistics Partner Registration Form
description: Logistics Partner Registration form Shypr operates as an on-demand shipping application, allowing users to request couriers to deliver items in a fast and efficient manner without having to leave their office or home.
